traits.name: Reckless
traits.detail: At the start of your turn, you can gain advantage on all melee attacks you make for that turn. However, all attacks against you gain advantage until the start of your next turn.

traits.name: Charge
traits.detail: If Zakroth moves at least 10 ft. in a straight line towards a target and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an additional 18 (4d8) piercing damage.

traits.name: Revenge
traits.detail: Zakroth cannot use Bloody Cleave while Belladonna is conscious. If Belladonna falls to 0 hp, Zakroth gains 100 temporary hit points, and can now use Bloody Cleave.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Zakroth uses Command or Dishonor, then makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Bloody Cleave (see Revenge)
actions.detail: Zakroth makes any number of melee attacks, but can only attack a given creature once as part of this action. If it is Zakroth's turn, he can move as normal between these attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 20 (3d8+7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Honorblade
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 21 (4d6+7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore (1/turn)
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 16 (2d8+7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dishonor
actions.detail: A creature within 30' of Zakroth must make a [dc-primary] WIS save or have disadvantage on attacks against other creatures until the end of Zakroth's next turn.

actions.name: Command
actions.detail: A creature within 60' of Zakroth must make a [dc-secondary] WIS save or follow Zakroth's one-word command on its next turn.
